medium.q: I have hands but cannot clap, I never talk but I move. I can be fast or slow, depending on the beat. What am I?

hard.q: Two siblings share a single pen. If one writes two pages and the other writes three, they finish five pages in total. How could they finish in exactly five minutes if each page takes one minute to write?
hard.a: They write different pages at the same time, so together they finish in five minutes.
hard.hint: Consider parallel work and the total time for each page.
